overview: A thousand years ago, Li Muwan relied on the Pearl of Rebirth to become a dragon, but her husband Yan Lin was killed by a mysterious man. A thousand years later, Yan Chixia, a disciple of the Demon Rebellion Alliance, is the one who has committed the act of righteousness. He is the resurrected Yan Lin, who has lost the memory of his past life, but his love for Li Muwan remains unchanged.
title: Yan Chixia and Dragon Lady
